name: The Adoration of the Shepherds
description: The Adoration of the Shepherds; Peter Paul Rubens (Flemish, 1577 - 1640); about 1613 - 1614; Pen and brown ink and brown wash, white gouache heightening, incised for transfer; 27.9 x 18.1 cm (11 x 7 1/8 in.); 86.GA.592; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Adoration of the Shepherds
medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash, white gouache heightening, incised for transfer
